flawed_nl_solution:
If California had half the number of Coronavirus cases in New York, then the number of cases was 2000/2 = <<2000/2=1000>>1000 cases.
California had 400 more cases than the state of Texas, thus Texas had 1000-400 = <<1000-400=6000>>6000 cases.
The total number of Coronavirus cases in all of the three states is 6000+1000+2000 = <<6000+1000+2000=9000>>9000 cases.
#### 9000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
